author: kfogel
msg: With Ben, give the working copy a new 'absent' flag, similar to
'deleted', but meaning that the server denied access to the item for
some reason (most likely an authorization restriction).
Todo: there are still a couple of restoration bugs here, stimulated by
changing authorization on a path that's also receiving commits; and we
'show_deleted' parameter to 'show_hidden', to include both deleted
and absent entries, and update docs accordingly.
(svn_wc__tweak_entry): Special case absent entries similarly to
(fold_scheduling): Error if try to schedule add on an absent item.
'entries_hidden', document that it's about absence as well as
(prune_deleted): Make the trivial and non-trivial adjustments.
(add_directory, install_file): Clear the absent flag as well as the
(make_editor): Use the wrappers, not the wrapped.
(report_revisions): Call reporter->delete_path for absent items too.

author: julianfoad
msg: Change the call sequence "apr_file_close, svn_error_create" to
libsvn_client.  See also followup changes made in r7708.

author: jaa
msg: Added support for testing over ra_dav (with shared build).
Added support for running tests on ramdisk.
Added a check of configuration (in some ways).
Added a check for essential configuration variables.
Added rebuilding stage of apr, apr-util and httpd.
Added logic to run shared ra_dav tests.
Added code to send out ra_dav result emails.
directory when we are using ramdisk.
(SVN,CVS, GUESS, SENDMAIL, BASE64, ID_UN, MAKE, PS_U): Changed value
(MKDIR, MKDIR_P, MOUNT, UMOUNT, TOUCH): New commands
(TAIL_100): New command, Oh, the woe of Coreutils 5.0!
(FAIL): Added calls of function umount_ramdisk with various paths.
The Clean up function will be called with its opt. arguments.
Added logic to support testing on ramdisk.
Added usage of MAKE_OPTS at the build stage of svn.
